oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Feldversuche mit Biofumigation zur Reduktion des Chalara- Befalls auf Karotten
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koller, Martin
Total, René
Michel, Vincent
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In order to reduce the infection with Chalara elegans and C. thievlaviopsis of organically produced carrots biofumigation treatments with Brassica juncea were carried out. In the two years of the experiment we could not find an infection reducing effect of the biofumigation treatment compared to the control treatment (fallow).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Koller, Martin; Total, René and Michel, Vincent (2009) Feldversuche mit Biofumigation zur Reduktion des Chalara- Befalls auf Karotten. Poster at: 10. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Zürich, 11.-13. Februar 2009.
